#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int arr[1025],i,j;
	for(i=0;i<=1024;i++)
	arr[i]=0;
	
	for(i=0;i<=1024;i++)
	{
		int num=i,count=0;
		string s;
		while(num>0)
		{
			int temp = num%2;
			num/=2;
			char ch = temp+48;
			s+=ch;	
		}
	//	cout<<s<<"\n";
	
		for(j=s.size()-1;j>=5;j--)
		{
			if(s[j]=='1' && s[j-1]=='0' && s[j-2]=='1' && s[j-3]=='0' && s[j-4]=='1' && s[j-5]=='0')
			{
				count++;
				j-=6;
			}
		}
		arr[i] = arr[i-1]+count;
	}
	for(i=1;i<=10;i++)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		cout<<arr[n]<<"\n";
	}
	
    return 0;
}
